00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00026 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_traits.h>
00027 #include <thrust/detail/dispatch/distance.h>
00028 
00029 namespace thrust
00030 {
00031 
00048 template<typename InputIterator>
00049   inline typename thrust::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::difference_type
00050     distance(InputIterator first, InputIterator last)
00051 {
00052   // dispatch on category
00053   return thrust::detail::dispatch::distance(first,last,
00054     typename thrust::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::iterator_category());
00055 } // end distance()
00056 
00060 } // end thrust
